title: Airport Information
content: Harry Reid International Airport (LAS) is located about 5 miles from the Strip.

title: Transportation
content: Ride-sharing services: Uber and Lyft are widely available

title: Parking
content: Valet parking: Available at all terminals

title: Weather
content: Average precipitation: 0.1-0.3 inches (2.5-7.6 mm) per day
